snippet.title: Talk to Strangers | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Talk to Strangers will be available on June 8th for the Nintendo Switch.
https://bit.ly/TalkToStrangersGame

Talk to Strangers is a survival game in everyday life. Survive door-to-door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in that order) as you try to sell products to strangers. But be careful: nothing is as it seems in this neighborhood.

Game Features:
- Explore a wide range of 36 DIFFERENT ENDINGS in the game.
- Enjoy visually appealing and consistent art style.
- Encounter a multitude of HILARIOUS dialogues that will keep you entertained.
- Immerse yourself in an engaging and PERFECTLY FITTED soundtrack.

________________________________________________________________________

About QUByte Interactive
 
QUByte is the largest publisher in Latin America in the indie segment for consoles and has its internal development studio, which is currently working on MARS 2120. QUByte's goal is to develop the local industry through partnerships in porting, publishing, and game development.

About Post Mortem Pixels
 
Post Mortem Pixels is a Brazilian punk label of independent games. It’s mainly composed by Dilly (creator of the label), Daniel and Kawakeiko. They seek to create games that explore the medium as a language in culture.

All rights reserved © 2023 QUByte Interactive.
